title: The Tech Weekender: Top news from the world of technology this week - Moneycontrol
content: The Tech Weekender: Top news from the world of technology this week  Moneycontrol
description: This week, Telegram's premium subscription spotted in Beta, we take the Samsung Galaxy Book 2 360 for a spin, test if the Realme GT Neo 3 is worth your time, give you the deets on Nothing's new phone, give you a rundown on under Rs 40,000-smartphones and tell you about Wi-Fi 7, the next big wireless protocol looming on the horizon.
